ending_theme: #01: "Ponkotsu Princess (ぽんこつプリンセス)" by Minarai Diva (ep 1)

#05: "Kinniku ni Negai wo (筋肉に願いを)" by Minarai Diva (ep 5)
#06: "Doyou no Wedding (土用のウェデイング)" by Minarai Diva (ep 6)
#07: "Majime ni Tsukutta Hazu no Kashi ga Tada no Light Novel Nandaga (真面目に作ったはずの歌詞がただのラノベなんだが)" by Minarai Diva (ep 7)
#08: "Houkago Kaitou Diva (放課後怪盗ディーバ)" by Minarai Diva (ep 8)
#09: "Genjitsu Touhi Rhapsody (現実逃避ラプソディー)" by Minarai Diva (ep 9)
